reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable, stretchy, and of great quality, appreciating its style and value for money. The material quality receives mixed feedback, with some describing it as thick while others find it cheap. The dress runs long for short people, and customers note it's a little see through.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Black formal dress
items.body: The dress is beautiful and a good price. The material is thick but very soft and stretchy. My daughter wore it for a winter formal dance. We can definitely reuse this dress and definitely recommend it. Read more
items.author: Lacey Garmon

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved the dress
items.body: I didn’t keep this dress because I was going for a specific oil for an event and this was a bit too simple. But it’s a gorgeous dress and fits perfectly. I’m usually a size 6-8 in dresses, I’m 5’4” with a 27” waist and 42” hips. Medium was perfect and I’ll keep this dress in mind for a more demure look. Read more
items.author: Nia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: Can’t wait to wear this at my husbands work Christmas party. The color is beautiful and the ruching helps with the midsection .. has a nice stretch to it. I’m sure i’ll receive lots of compliments Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars very flattering on tummy area
items.body: Really great dress!!!! Good for most occasions! I bought a size large and i am 5’8 170lbs I wore this to a gala when i was 8 weeks Post baby #4 and it hid my jelly belly really well. The slit was higher than i thought so i couldn’t wear shorts style spanx underneath but other than that the overall fit was very comfy. The material is almost like a workout material and very soft. Bonus is that the slit is placed in such a way when the dress blows from the wind it doesn’t blow open to expose your lady parts. I didn’t feel like i was constantly adjusting the slit or the middle ruching but the straps did keep falling down my shoulder. To note, i did size up due to not being my normal weight so in the future i would just order my regular size. Read more
items.author: Leighanne55

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Too short
items.body: Very short for my daughter, she’s 6’. Read more
items.author: Rebecca Walrath

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get it!
items.body: I absolutely loved this. I got so many compliments on it! I looked snatched and sexy. It’s comfy and stretchy so I was able to dance and have a blast without worrying Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Your confirmation to buy the dress
items.body: I absolutely love this dress. I bought it along with another one just in case and there wasn’t even a question which on was best. I’m 5’5 and 215 lbs and I have a tummy but even without the tummy control shorts I had on under the dress, it camouflaged my tummy so well! I am too heavy and the top fit to me and the bottom of the dress flared with a sexy slit that wasn’t too high. The material is stretchy and it’s not too thin of material. Great for Spring/Summer/Fall without getting cold and the material is airy enough to keep you from getting too hot. Read more
items.author: Brie

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Too long!
items.body: Nice fit, but low quality fabric/material. Length is too long for short people. Material is too thin. Read more
items.author: Lauren Anderson

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal High Split Ruched Bodycon Evening Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal High Split Ruched Bodycon Evening Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Winered, Navy, Pink, White, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
